bug.author: shreyasvj25
bug.summary: use try and except block around StopIteration or avoid StopIteration completely
bug.description:
is deprecated from python3.6+, <denchmark-link:https://docs.python.org/3.6/whatsnew/3.6.html#deprecated-python-behavior>https://docs.python.org/3.6/whatsnew/3.6.html#deprecated-python-behavior</denchmark-link>
As per <denchmark-link:https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0479/>https://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0479/</denchmark-link> we should not use on generators. See <denchmark-link:https://github.com/apple/turicreate/issues/636>#636</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/znation>@znation</denchmark-link> <denchmark-link:https://github.com/TobyRoseman>@TobyRoseman</denchmark-link> Please assign this ticket to me as I would like to try fixing it and contribute. Thanks in advance!
